author: Goran Davidović
description: English If you are visiting Belgrade and need a hand with public transport, this is the app for you! With full and up-to-date information on Belgrade's public transit systems, a shortest route calculation feature, integration with Google Maps and Google Places Search and GPS geolocation support, Beoprevoz makes your navigation in Belgrade a breeze. Use the "nearby stations" feature in the transport network screen to see what your nearby public transport options are, or search for your destination, pinpoint its location on the interactive and high-quality Google-provided map and view the directions for reaching it from your current location. You are in a bus and have no Internet access? No problem! All the data is stored on your phone so the only feature you won't be able to use without Internet is Google-provided places search and Google Maps. Everything else, including "nearby stations" and "directions" features works just as fine. Srpski Bez obzira na to da li posećujete Beograd i potrebna Vam je pomoć u kretanju gradskim prevozom ili ste stanovnik koji želi da dođe do sasvim nepoznatog mesta, Beoprevoz je aplikacija za vas! Uz pune i maksimalno ažurne podatke o sistemu javnog prevoza u Beogradu, mogućnost izračunavanja najkraćeg puta, integraciju sa Google Maps i Google Places Search servisima i podrška za GPS lociranje, Beoprevoz čini Vaše kretanje kroz Beograd lako kao nekoliko poteza po ekranu Vašeg telefona. Koristite "obližnje stanice" na ekranu mreže prevoza kako biste videli kakve su Vam trenutno opcije što se gradskog prevoza tiče, ili potražite vaše odredište, prikažite njegovu lokaciju na interaktivnoj i kvalitetnoj Google mapi i dobijte uputstva za dolazak do njega od Vaše trenutne lokacije. Nalazite se u busu i nemate pristup Internetu? Nikakav problem! Svi podaci se skladište na sâmom telefonu tako da su Google servisi (mape i pretraga mesta) jedina mogućnost koju nećete moći da koristite bez Interneta. Sve osim toga, uključujući "obližnje stanice" i "uputstva" radi bez problema.
name: Beoprevoz
